PHRASE.LANG:
Defy The Bureau's expectations and rise up in rebellion! Kit yourself out with this Outkast outfit pack.
 
 This bundle contains:
 (1) Severance - Evolution Jacket - Grey (Men)
 (2) Severance - Evolution Jacket - Black (Men)
 (3) Severance - Leather Trousers - Grey (Men)
 (4) Severance - Leather Trousers - Black (Men)
 (5) Severance - Leather Boots - Grey (Men)
 (6) Severance - Leather Boots - Black (Men)
 (7) Severance - Mohawk (Men) [#Legal]

 (2) Severance - Blouson Evolution - Noir (homme)

 (4) Severance - Pantalon en cuir - Noir (homme)
 (5) Severance - Bottes en cuir - Gris (homme)
 (6) Severance - Bottes en cuir - Noir (homme)
 (7) Severance - Mohawk (Homme) [#Legal]

 (6) Severance - Stivali di pelle - Nero (Uomo)
